gold.user: User requests to fetch details of a specific assigned add-on for a given incoming phone number.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the assigned add-on including its configuration and status.

gold.user: User wants to remove an assigned add-on from an incoming phone number.
gold.ideal: Confirms the successful deletion of the assigned add-on.

gold.user: User requests a list of all assigned add-ons for a specific incoming phone number.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all assigned add-ons with their details.

gold.user: User wants to assign a new add-on to an incoming phone number.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the newly assigned add-on including its configuration.
